com.cloudpos.fingerprint

Interface FingerprintDevice

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Device

    public interface FingerprintDevice
extends Device
    The fingerprint interface defines the finger print APIs to be used by the applications.

    The fingerprint device object is obtained from the POSTerminal, its' as follows: 

     FingerprintDevice fingerprintDevice =
         (FingerprintDevice) POSTerminal.getInstance().getDevice("cloudpos.device.fingerprint");
    Among them, the "cloudpos.device.fingerprint" string is to identify the fingerprint device, defined by the specific implementation.

    Uses the fingerprint device object to control the operation of the fingerprint device.

    An app can request permission to access the device, as shown below: 

     <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.CLOUDPOS_FINGERPRINT"/>
    See Also:
    Device

    • Method Detail

      • listenForFingerprint

        void listenForFingerprint(OperationListener listener,
                        int timeout)
                          throws DeviceException
        Starts scan the finger print.

        This is an asynchronous method. handleResult() will be invoked when captured the finger print. Information about successfully detected card can be retrieved by the getFingerprint(int,int) function.

        Because this method uses a timeout parameter, the device receiving this request MUST be able to successfully respond to cancelRequest() and abort the operation.

        In case of a timeout occurring, the operation result will contain code= ERR_TIMEOUT, and no information about card will be available.

        Parameters:
        listener - operation listener.
        timeout - the maximum scanning time of the method, in milliseconds.
        Throws:
        DeviceException - for the standard reasons that are documented in DeviceException

      • waitForFingerprint

        FingerprintOperationResult waitForFingerprint(int timeout)
                                              throws DeviceException
        This is the synchronous method of the listenForFingerprint(OperationListener,int).
        Parameters:
        timeout - the maximum scanning time of the method, in milliseconds.
        Returns:
        the card of scanning. null if scanning timeout.
        Throws:
        DeviceException - for the standard reasons that are documented in DeviceException

      • match

        int match(Fingerprint fingerprint1,
        Fingerprint fingerprint2)
          throws DeviceException
        Matches the two finger print.

        Parameters:
        fingerprint1 - fingerprint2
        Returns:
        percent of matching.
        Throws:
        DeviceException - for the standard reasons that are documented in DeviceException
